articles.author: Douglas Belkin  and Joseph Pisani
articles.title: Uvalde Mourns Victims of Texas School Shooting in Grief and Anger - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Children clung to their mothers and cried as mourners streamed to a corner near Robb Elementary School to pay their respects to the 21 people killed there this week. President Biden urged Americans to do more to try to curb gun violence.
articles.content: UVALDE, TexasA steady stream of mourners, many driving in from other cities while leaving behind other Memorial Day plans, came to Robb Elementary School on Saturday afternoon to pay respects to the … [+278 chars]

articles.title: Top Gun: Maverick Takes Flight with $116.5M in Global Box Office Through Friday - Boxoffice - Boxoffice Pro
articles.description: Top Gun: Maverick finished its first Friday in theatrical release with $116.5 million global ticket sales, a tally that includes $19 million from domestic previews and $40.2 million from overseas showtimes ahead of its official opening date in North America. …

articles.title: 'Most powerful meteor storm in generations could light up skies above North America early next week - Daily Mail
articles.description: The most powerful meteor storm 'in generations' could light up skies above North America on Tuesday morning, according to NASA.
articles.content:
The 'most powerful meteor storm in generations' could light up skies above North America next week.

articles.title: NASA Astronaut Heard Rumor of Being Abandoned in Space From His Wife - Futurism
articles.description: A March rumor that the Russians were going to abandon an American astronaut aboard the ISS made its way to the astronaut in question in an roundabout fashion.
articles.content:
